subject: Snowboarding
Olympic Games
X Games
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Since settling for a silver medal at last year’s Olympics, Lindsey Jacobellis is again favored to win the snowboardcross final Saturday afternoon at the Winter X Games.
snippet: Since settling for a silver medal at last year’s Olympics, Lindsey Jacobellis is again favored to win the snowboardcross final Saturday afternoon at the Winter X Games.
